Posts.Content: sweetrbg wrote: I am 39 y/o.  In Jan 2008 I was diagnosed with cervical cancer.  They did a hysterectomy and at that time they "incidentally found a rare tumor in my appendix".  (After hyster I couldn't walk/drive for 3 months.  I started driving again last week, and now this)  Anyways I have been feeling pain in my left breast for  a while.  Out of concern I got a mammogram done last Monday.  By Thursday I got a letter in the mail stating I have to go for an ultrasound.  I am freaking out.  I have been reading on line and looking at pics.  My left breast has a different skin texture but the nipple area and everything is fine.  Knock on wood. I don't have an orange to compare the texture to.   I got a copy of the mammo report and it states there is some type of change in the outer lateral area to both breasts compared to my mammo in '05.  I have fibrocystic breasts.  I'm pretty worried considering all the things I've had to endure this year. I go for the ultrasound on Thursday.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast Pain sweetrbg nowheregirl
